edelgard8.name: Edelgard
edelgard8.title: Of Rivals
edelgard8.description: One of the Emblems who were summoned to another Elyos. Resides in the Bracelet of the Three Houses. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses / Engage.
edelgard8.emblem:
Enhanced Engaged Special
When Special triggers, boosts damage by unit's max Special cooldown count value × 4 (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
If unit initiates combat, grants another action to unit after combat (once per turn; triggers only when unit's Range = 1).
Neutralizes effects that grant unit another action after combat and after unit acts and effects that are triggered at those times (such as effects that re-enable Canto after Canto triggers or effects that inflict Gravity on unit and unit's Pair Up cohort); does not apply to Specials like Galeforce that grant unit another action when triggered, status effects like Share Spoils, or effects that grant unit another action if an Assist skill is used.

Castle Hall: A me from the Officers Academy is here. It is odd. We look alike, but only I know where her journey takes her.
Though ruled by dragons, Elyos lacks the corruption I despise. Besides, the Divine Dragon there was already...
Everyone in the Black Eagle House is still precious to me. I may no longer lead them, but I hope to see them.
I can eat and drink here, so I wish to try the teas I used to share with the professor. Would you like to join me?
Dimitri, Claude, and I now fight as one. It can now be said that they have become trusted allies.
Visit:
This greeting is a show of friendship from [F].
I suspect I will be visiting this castle again in the future.
Level: A positive result. Dimitri and Claude will also be pleased with this.
Such notable improvement comes as no surprise. Now, shall we continue to the next battle?
Pessimism serves no purpose now, for this is not the end.
Summon: I am Emblem Edelgard. I entrust you with my power that you might wield it as your heart desires.
Learn Skill: It is important to have power, as an Emblem and as an individual Hero.
Confession:
Is something wrong, Summoner? You are eyeing me with such interest. Is it that my expression seems too soft?
It makes sense that you might think so if you knew only the me in Fódlan. I do not bear the same burdens.
As an Emblem, I existed apart from the world of Fódlan, and the Elyos I manifested in was destroyed.
My...our purpose is to unite in the effort of fighting alongside you to support your goals and values.
At times, you seem mysterious, like the professor or the Divine Dragon. Please, allow me to stay by your side.
Status: This world is very comfortable. I feel as though...I can simply be myself.
Ahhh! Oh... I apologize for losing my composure. I am still getting used to being able to feel it when I am touched.
If you are looking for Dimitri and Claude, they are not with me right now. It is only me.
I was sealed away in Elyos for a long time. By the time I awakened, the world was already headed for ruin.
"Lead us, Emblem of Rivals..." That is the invocation that summoned us. Have you memorized it?
We were three Emblems in one, so it is lonely being by myself. Although the quiet is a refreshing change.
This version of me is an Emblem. An entity that doesn't follow a separate path. I will endeavor to be worthy of everyone's trust.

baldr3.name: Baldr
baldr3.title: New Year's Elite
baldr3.description: Gods of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, who descend from the heavens to deliver the best possible New Year.
baldr3.duo:
Neutralizes any【Penalty】and grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6,【Fringe Bonus】, and 【Cancel Affinity】to unit and allies within 3 spaces of unit for 1 turn.
(Duo Skills can be used once per map by tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill like Panic or Threaten and negative status effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting movement, or the effects of a skill like Triangle Adept or Guard).
【Fringe Bonus】
Grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res during combat = highest bonus on each stat between unit and allies within 2 spaces of unit for 1 turn. Calculates each stat bonus independently.
【Cancel Affinity】
If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reverses weapon-triangle advantage granted by foe's skills for 1 turn.

Castle Hall: **Höðr:** I am so happy I get to celebrate the New Year with Baldr. And Váli is happy as well... Oh, thank goodness.
**Baldr:** You may know me as the Celestial Sun God. Bow to me as you do to the sun when it first ascends this year!
**Höðr:** All this food... So colorful and so beautiful. This must be a custom of mortals. I...like it.
**Höðr:** Are you not...uncomfortable, Baldr? This kimono is so tight. I do not know if I can handle it...
**Baldr:** I train every day, no matter if it's the first of the year or the last. Unrivaled strength stems from consistency!
Visit: We are Baldr and Höðr, from Ásgarðr. Let us celebrate a new year's arrival alongside [F]!
Level: **Baldr:** Ohohohoho! We shall be unstoppable in all our endeavors this year, as with every year!
**Höðr:** H-Happy New Year! Oh, Baldr... I did it. I said the New Year's greeting.
**Höðr:** I am so sorry... The year just began and I am already holding you back, Baldr...
Summon: We, Baldr and Höðr, have descended from the heavenly realm of Ásgarðr! I will make this the most brilliant year!
Learn Skill: **Höðr:** Baldr, I have received money for the New Year... It is called an otoshidama. I would like to share it with you.
Confession:
**Höðr:** B-Baldr, wait... I cannot run so fast in this kimono...
**Baldr:** Oh, Höðr. You will be fine. If you keep moving, you will get used to it. Now, quickly, this way!
There is so much to do on New Year's in Midgard!
There is hanetsuki, a facial puzzle game called fukuwarai, kite flying, spinning tops...
And it is my duty to emerge victorious in each and every one of them! I will start the new year in brilliant fashion!
**Höðr:** Oh...that is so like you, Baldr. You are so noble and so proud... It is dazzling. Your brilliance is blinding to me...
**Baldr:** You shine with brilliance as well, Höðr! Now, let us shine together! Ohohohoho!
Status: "These outfits bring out our natural beauty. I approve." "Even...for me?"
Conversation: **Baldr:** Höðr, what are those strange noises you are making?
**Höðr:** Oh, I just can't seem to get comfortable in this kimono. It is so...tight.
**Baldr:** Yes, well... It should not matter what we wear. We must stand gallant.
Lift your head. Chin up. Straighten your back. Eyes forward.
**Höðr:** But I'm not like you, Baldr. There is no reason for me to look so...dignified.
**Baldr:** Nonsense. You are my sister. Where is your confidence?
**Höðr:** But I am not strong or pretty. I am... not worthy of being your sister.
**Baldr:** How can you say such foolish things? Do you not see your beauty or your strength?
You are magnificent. You are not afraid to show weakness...
And you seek truth with sincerity and allow justice to guide you. You must believe in yourself, Höðr.
**Höðr:** Y-you really think that of me?
**Baldr:** Of course. I have kept my eye on you more than anyone else has. Do you not believe me?
**Höðr:** N-No! I mean... Yes, I believe you.
**Baldr:** Good. Then you can carry yourself with confidence, starting this year.
**Höðr:** That will be difficult. But if you say I should, then I'll try my best... I will make it my New Year's resolution.

heimdallr2.name: Heimdallr
heimdallr2.title: New Year's Vision
heimdallr2.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, who is known for her foresight. She plans out the perfect year on its very first day.

Castle Hall: Even I did not foresee myself celebrating the coming of a new year amongst mortals.
At the onset of every new year, mortals wonder what will come of the future... It is fascinating, yes?
I have decided not to foresee the results of my fortune. Or rather, I cannot do so, even if I wish to.
Never have I donned such attire as this...kimono. Tell me, has Loki worn one as well?
My plans? Humph. This is the year I shall best Loki.
Visit: I am Heimdallr, god of foresight. It is my prediction that [F]will aid you.
Level: My plans are flawless. There is nothing I do not foresee.
Got caught up in the New Year's festivities? I suppose predicting this was unnecessary.
Summon: I am Heimdallr, god of foresight. I wish to proceed with my plans for this year without disruption.
Learn Skill: Even I did not expect such a gift. You have my gratitude.
Confession:
I foresee all matters, however...this event was unexpected.
Despite that, I see all that will occur from this year forward, including what becomes of you and me.
It is unwise for you to conclude that my foresight renders my plans painless.
No... In order to proceed as foreseen, it takes constant effort and careful preparation.
You shall aid me in my endeavors, for that is a future that cannot hide from my sight.
Status: Humph.
I am Heimdallr, god of foresight. The events of this year cannot hide from my predictions.
Ah ah ah... *sigh* I knew you would try that.
My plans for the year are ready to come to fruition. *sigh* It is relaxing knowing what is to come.
New Year's Day determines one's fate for the coming year... Humph. I am fond of this sentiment.
Omikuji are a fascinating tradition of fortunes. Yet, not even I can foretell what predictions may emerge.
One day, Loki, I will read you like the cheap book you are...
You and I will have a good year. According to plan, of course.

sedgar2.name: Sedgar
sedgar2.title: Festive Horseman
sedgar2.description: Second in command of the Coyote's Men of Aurelis under Hardin's command. He is calm and collected as he stands amidst the morning glow, unaffected by the New Year's liveliness. Appears in Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem.

Castle Hall: We celebrate the new year where I'm from too. Even still, Hoshido's New Year's customs are full of surprises.

I imagine everyone in Aurelis dancing hand in hand right about now.
It was under Lord Hardin that we brought peace back to the kingdom.
I'm sure preparing all this food was a lot of work... But the people of the plains prefer not to overindulge.
It is good to enjoy the New Year celebrations, but...I saw someone lacking any sort of restraint...
This white, paste-like thing is delicious.
Visit: I am Sedgar, of the knights of Aurelis. This is a New Year's gift to share from [F].
Level: They say you should drink and make merry. But the New Year doesn't excuse poor behavior.
Happy New Year! I will show the proper etiquette of one directly under Lord Hardin.
"May we continue to cooperate in the coming year." How did that sound?
Summon: Happy New Year! I am Sedgar, a knight of Aurelis. I may be a little too excited... I must be careful.
Learn Skill: I must grow stronger in order to battle through to the next year.
Confession:
Happy New Year! It feels a bit strange starting out the new year practicing the customs of another kingdom...
I am curious what is happening back home, but...I suppose my curiosity does nothing for me here.
It will take time for me to get used to these food and drink habits. And that's not to mention this kimono.
In the end, the Coyote's Men are people of the plains. I do not intend to become like an Archanean noble.
Not to worry though. People like us are necessary to maintain peace among those celebrating the New Year.
Status: To a happy and prosperous new year!
*stutter* Hey! Careful, or you'll mess up my kimono.
The weapons are all polished and ready to greet the new year.
Wolf is incredibly talented, to put it simply.
The Coyote's Men will greet Lord Hardin together and wish him a happy new year.
In this new year, I must grow even further...
This year, as with every year, I devote all my strength for the sake of peace. And I shall do so by your side.

v\u00e1li2.name: Váli
v\u00e1li2.title: Devoted Sister
v\u00e1li2.description: A god of Ásgarðr, the celestial realm, who adores her sister Baldr and is celebrating the New Year and all its splendor with her.

Castle Hall: The one thing even more brilliant than the New Year's sunrise is the smile of my sister, Baldr!
Aiding Baldr is everything to me, the purpose of my existence. That will never change, even in the new year!
I will lend you my aid this year. But I won't forgive terrible leadership!
This kimono is so...tight! But it does match Baldr's, so... I will wear it proudly!
My goal this year is to defeat every enemy of Baldr! No matter what!
Visit: I am Váli, a goddess of Ásgarðr. I am enjoying the New Year with my sister at [F]'s castle.
Level: Did you see that, Baldr? This year, as with every year, I devote myself wholly to you!
I will not stop getting stronger this year!
Grrr... This year is a mess already! I can't face Baldr like this!
Summon: I am Váli. I can't believe I get to spend New Year's with Baldr... This is the perfect year!
Learn Skill: This year is shaping up! I'll be able to help Baldr even more now!
Confession:
Baldr looks so lovely in her kimono. I may have used up all my good luck this year simply by seeing her.
Don't you see... The world revolves around Baldr, this year and every year. There is no doubting that.
What we must do is remove anything that could possibly get in her way!
I will pulverize anything that clouds her brilliance!
You are no exception, you know. Support her well and stay out of her way! Got it?!
Status: Hm...
The saying is "Happy New Year!" Of course I know that!
*grunt* This is the year you'll face judgment for your acts.
Baldr looks impeccable, as always. I could faint before such majesty...
A New Year's present from Baldr?! I will treasure it for the rest of my life!
An enemy of my sister is an enemy of mine. I will avenge her even if I die doing so.
I am told the belief held here is that New Year's Day is the sun's birthday. *gasp* So it is a celebration for my sister, the Celestial Sun God.
For as long as the mission is with Baldr, I will fight beside you.
